w21zkpu7jt.name: PLQ Mall
w21zkpu7jt.directions:
Musholla is at B1A carpark.

Take the escalator down to B2 and walk towards the carpark. You will see a money changer, "Altas Exchange" on your left. Take travellator beside it up to B1A. Walk towards the bicycle parking and you'll see the prayer rooms
w21zkpu7jt.provision: Slippers, Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator, Wudu' Area
w21zkpu7jt.remarks: Wudu' Area is nearby at the wheelchair accessible toilet.
